remarks: The ` ZZ ` ring homomorphism maps elements to their equivalence classes.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 15-Jun-2015.)  (Revised by AV, 13-Jun-2019.)
statement:
znzrh2.s $e |- S = ( RSpan ` ZZring ) $.
znzrh2.r $e |- .~ = ( ZZring ~QG ( S ` { N } ) ) $.
znzrh2.y $e |- Y = ( Z/nZ ` N ) $.
znzrh2.2 $e |- L = ( ZRHom ` Y ) $.
znzrhval $p |- ( ( N e. NN0 /\ A e. ZZ ) -> ( L ` A ) = [ A ] .~ ) $.
